ygData.subject: Re: A question on magic
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s also what I constated. It was pretty evident when I got Gate at level 4A; I tried it once, fizzle and two bubbles were gone. I tried it again and
ygData.messageBody:
According to Trevor K. Wagner:
> My experience is that it takes about half of what the spell costs, although
> I have no real statistical data to back this statement up.

That's also what I constated. It was pretty evident when I got Gate at
level 4A; I tried it once, fizzle and two bubbles were gone. I tried it again
and got the message "Insufficient Mana". The spell worked when I
was almost at the end of the fourth bubble.

--
